description.b: In this tutorial, we'll setup our environment, create our first Escape project, copy in a model, and run it!

item.title: Open the Escape Perspective
item.description: If you're not already there, open the Escape Perspective. Select Window > Open Perspective > Other.. and then Escape. (Or you can choose Window > Reset Perspective and the Agent Modeling perspective should appear in the Open Perspective list itself.)

item.title: Create an Escape Java project.
item.description: Next, let's create the project where we'll place our model. Select File > New > Escape Java Project. Give it a name like "escape.tutorial", then click Finish.
